title: Hour 1 - Remembering Eddie Sutton (05-25-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Remembering Eddie Sutton (05-25-20)
description:
With Dan & the Dannettes off, Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb fill in. They discuss Tiger Woods and Peyton Manning winning The Match over Phil Mickelson and Tom Brady. They discuss the potential return of the NBA in July and Doug shares some memories about the passing of his former head coach Eddie Sutton.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
